Package net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.handler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientSideHandlerGenerator
    Provides methods to generate a javascript equivalent of a resourcehandler, used to generate links in a non dynamic page where taglibs cannot be used.
    ResourceBundlesHandler
    Main interface to work with resource bundles.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CachedResourceBundlesHandler
    ResourceBundlesHandler wrapper implementation that uses a ConcurrentHashMap to cache the resources.
    ClientSideHandlerGeneratorImpl
    Implementation of ClientSideHandlerGenerator
    ClientSideHandlerScriptRequestHandler
    Handles requests for the client side script used in non dynamic html pages.
    ResourceBundlesHandlerImpl
    Default implementation of ResourceBundlesHandler
